description: ** Update, now includes Elvish and Klingon! ** Manic 8 Ball can tell you what to do. Just ask it a yes or no question, and it will give you the wisdom of the ages, guaranteed to always be 100% accurate at least 35% of the time. But wait, there's more! What good is an electronic oracle if you are limited to only 2 responses (or even 20)? "No good", I say. So this powerful predictor has almost 200 responses! And what if you only want "Yes" responses? Or perhaps you think in emoticons? No worries, this ball has just the answers you are looking for! :)  *** Pick from 7 different response types: 1. Manic, 2. Classic, 3. Emoticons, 4. Only Yes, 5. Only No, 6. Klingon, 7. Elvish
